projectInformation.title: Space creation from search
projectInformation.subtitle: User journey for search space creation

journeys.title: User journey A
journeys.subtitle: Lin wants to make new campaign content available to her local market resellers. Lin cannot publish content, but Brenda can do it for her.

steps.description: Lin performs a search for the content she wants to make available
Lin identified the content she wants to make available
Lin indicates that she wants to share the content with Brenda
Lin shares the content with Brenda, along with an additional message containing her request to publish the content
Brenda gets notified that Lin shared content with her
Brenda clicks a call-to-action in the notification to see the content & message Lin shared with her
Brenda shares the content with the target audience
Lin gets notified that Brenda shared the content
